(Errr...Logo, I shot an ion disk at one of Trike's characters, not Ramulus.  
And it's ion, a form of energy.  If Ursa bit it, the it'd be like biting a 
laser bolt)


Pyro/Breakdown/Double Punch/Injector/Bumblebee/Manterror:


Pyro chuckled as Ursa Major's shots dug into his heavily armored tank mode, a 
burst off flames shooting at her.

---

Breakdown saw the three Maximals retreating.  Bringing up his targeting 
equipment, he fired a large explosive shell at area in front of them as they 
ran.

---

Double Punch jumped down, letting the Maximals run by him.

---

Bumblebee raised a launcher, firing three stinger missile at Stegotron and 
the other retreating Maximals.

---

Injector got up.  "YOU BETTER RUN!" he yelled, smiling madly, firing two 
stinger missiles at the retreating Maximals.

---

Manterror raised both arms, firing an ion disk at the retreating Maximals, 
one at Ramulus' left knee.
